message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product for a price that I think is fair. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with an offer of $1100000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay $1050000 for it.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1080000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal. I believe the product is worth more to you than that, and I'm willing to give you a good deal, but I need to get closer to my minimum of $1200000.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $1075000 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Bob. I'm getting closer to my target, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $1090000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident that it's a fair price for both of us.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $1085000 for the product.
